name: Cookie Adventure (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
Description:
Cookie Adventure is a turn-based Battle where you play as a cookie adventurer that is on a mission to defeat the pudding clan boss.

Features:
- Exciting Turn-Based Battle
- Cute Cookie & Candy Themed World
- Action Meter To Decide Game Turn
- Etc

Team Members:
- Alana - Supervisor
- Dwi Kurniawan Aliputra - 2602063610 - Game Manager
- Febriyanto - 2602098173 - Game Designer
- Garibaldi Britann - 2301846370 - Game Designer
- Alvin Kusuma - 2440004735 - Programmer
- Audry Angelina Wijaya - 2602170871 - Game Artist (Character Artist)
- Christopher Alexander Chandra - 2602081462 - Game Artist (Background Artist)
- Fayyadh Arya Zulfan - 2602187286 - Sound Engineer
